text:
hey , can I create an association between the "tasks" and the "custom object" I created in HubSpot through Make?
if yes, where can i find this number?

Hi <#C019VT42R8X|workflows>

I am trying to use a call's create date and custom code to determine the day of the week. Monday =1, Sunday = 7, etc.

I have no knowledge of coding, and I tried using generators to assist. However, the error of something not being defined or the date format not reading right persists and none of the code has run successfully.

Attached is the setup, can anyone assist with the code?:pray:

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/objects/custom-objects>

you will need to hit the schemas for tha tcustom object, use that custom object (to object type) in this call as the object type id

â€¢ `/crm/v3/schemas/{objectTypeId}`
you will see in the return call the associations like this: <https://share.zight.com/jkuj4dYp>

my example was a get request: <https://api.HubSpot.com/crm/v3/schemas/2-20617058>
yours will be different
